Ecological notes : found in broad-leaved and carr woodland; calcareous grassland adjacent to hanger woodland; damp heathland; wetlands including water meadows, sedge bed and bog; former gravel workings; grassland at woodland fringe; grounds of horticultural research station; school grounds with old poplars; garden. iii–x.
